G

Game - Class in logic
The Class Game - contains all the game elements, as well as the board the game mecanics.
Game() - Constructor for class logic.Game
 
get_board() - Method in class logic.Maze
Gets the game board.
get_board_cells() - Method in class logic.Maze
Gets all the empty cells of the board (where new elements can be place.
get_board_position(int[]) - Method in class logic.Maze
Gets the character of a certain board position.
get_burn_positions() - Method in class logic.Element
Gets the burn_positions, that is the coordinates of the 8 cells where the dragon's fire can reach the element.
get_darts() - Method in class logic.Game
Gets the darts.
get_dragon_type() - Method in class logic.Game
Gets the dragon type.
get_dragons() - Method in class logic.Game
Gets the dragons.

Gets the exit.

Gets the game state.

get_maze_type() - Method in class logic.Game
Gets the maze type.
get_neighbour_positions() - Method in class logic.Element
Gets the neighbour_positions of an element, that is the coordinates of the four cells adjacent to the element.

Gets the sword.
getMove() - Method in class logic.Move_Dragon
Gets the move, that is, the random number that indicates the dragon's next move.
